member.name: M:WinterRose.Serialization.SnowSerializer.Serialize``1(``0,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Serialize an object to the Snow-Format. returns a string containing all datafields. Check the README.md provided for supported values. skips and any value with the "ExcludeFromSerialization" attribute
member.returns: a string format containing all data from the given object
member.exception: thrown when no type corrosponding with a class field is found
thrown if creation of classfield instance has failed
thrown when any error is thrown. holds this thrown error as its inner exception

member.name: M:WinterRose.Serialization.SnowSerializer.SerializeList``1(System.Collections.Generic.List{``0},System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Int32)
member.summary: Serialize a list of objects to the Snow-format. returns a string containing all objects with their datafields. can only nest 2 classes from the base class if the amount of items to handle is more than 5000 it uses 4 threads and processes 4 items at once if is set to true it will process only 1 object at a time no matter the total objects to be handled. else it will determain the best distribution among the allowed usable threads and processes multiple at once
member.returns: string containing the data of every object instance in the provided list
member.exception: thrown when no type corrosponding with a class field is found
thrown if creation of classfield instance has failed
thrown when any error is thrown. holds this thrown error as its inner exception

member.returns: string containing the data of every object instance in the provided array
member.exception: thrown when no type corrosponding with a class field is found
thrown if creation of classfield instance has failed

member.name: M:WinterRose.Serialization.SnowSerializer.Deserialize``1(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Deserialize a string from the Snow-Format into a C# class object. when 'ignoreNotFoundFields' is true it will not throw an exception when it tries to deserialize a field which does not exist in the given class. the data that was linked to the field will be ignored aswell.
member.returns: the deserialized object with values given from the serialized string
member.exception: thrown when 'assembly' or 'typeName' are null when working with a classfield object
thrown when no type was found for the classfield object
thrown when when the serializer could not cast the string value to the given field type
thrown when any error is thrown. holds this thrown error as its inner exception

member.returns: a list of objects containing the data that was extracted from the provided serialized string
member.exception: thrown when 'assembly' or 'typeName' are null when working with a classfield object

member.name: F:WinterRose.Serialization.SerializerSettings.theadsToUse
